simple_cache

API module for control simple cache system from Erlang and OTP in Action.

API module for control simple cache system from Erlang and OTP in Action

Functions

insert(Key::term(), Value::term(), LeaseTime::integer()) -> ok

Insert {Key, Value} pair to cache with given LeaseTime

insert(Key::term(), Value::term()) -> ok

Insert {Key, Value} pair to cache with default lease time

lookup(Key::term()) -> {ok, Value::term()} | {error, not_found}

Look up an Value in cache

delete(Key::term()) -> ok

Delete Key from cache
